<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Safety Measures](/Feats.aspx?ID=3241) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 133</row>

**Archetype** [Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118)

**Prerequisites**
[Demolitionist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3240)

</column>

---

You're often careful to be sure you're not hoisted on your own petard, or anyone else's, for that matter. When you have cover from a [bomb](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-bombs), you gain resistance to damage caused by that bomb equal to half your level, plus a value equal to the circumstance bonus to AC granted by the cover. You gain these benefits against your own bombs regardless of whether you have cover.
name: Safety Measures
